rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0001
rows.name:
Allow me to formally introduce myself:
My name is Kentaro Nagi.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0002
rows.name:
You may remember me as captain of the White Whale,
but now I serve as Secretary of Defense here for New LA. [ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0003
rows.name:
The provisional government has charged me
with keeping the peace,[ST:page p1=90 ]so all military and police matters fall under my jurisdiction.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0004
rows.name: He's also my superior officer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0005
rows.name:
And he'd be an excellent person to talk to
when you're ready to start looking for work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0006_m
rows.name:
What about a job right here with BLADE?
He seems capable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0006_f
rows.name:
What about a job right here with BLADE?
She seems capable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0007_m
rows.name:
Let's give it a little more time—at least until he
knows enough to be able to make an informed decision.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0007_f
rows.name:
Let's give it a little more time—at least until she
knows enough to be able to make an informed decision.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0008_m
rows.name: He seems to be suffering from some form of memory loss.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0008_f
rows.name: She seems to be suffering from some form of memory loss.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0009
rows.name: Memory loss...? From the stasis?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0010_m
rows.name:
He could barely remember his name—and nothing at all
about what happened to Earth or the White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0010_f
rows.name:
She could barely remember her name—and nothing at all
about what happened to Earth or the White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0011
rows.name: I see...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0012
rows.name:
Though, come to think of it, the entire lot of us
have only been on this planet for what, two months?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0013
rows.name: It shouldn't take very long to get caught up.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0014
rows.name: My thoughts exactly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0015
rows.name: Well then...where should we begin?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: xs01040150_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask how we ended up on Mira.

rows.label: xs01040150_JNK0020
rows.name: Clarify

rows.label: xs01040150_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask for more information about BLADE.

rows.label: xs01040150_JNK0030
rows.name: Question

rows.label: xs01040150_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask about registration.

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0016
rows.name: It started at the end, two years ago.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0017
rows.name:
The end of Earth—the casualty of a battle
between two hyper-advanced alien civilizations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0018
rows.name:
Their technology and weapons were...beyond our
comprehension. We were like infants... Naked, powerless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0019
rows.name: The Earth was reduced to ash—and blown away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0020
rows.name:
I still wonder if I hadn't been there...if maybe
all of this could have somehow been avoided...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0021
rows.name: No one can know that, Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0022
rows.name:
What we DO know is, without you, there'd have been
no Project Exodus, and no escape, for any of us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0023
rows.name:
Did it go perfectly? No.
But we are here, and we are alive. We survived.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0025
rows.name: So yes, Project Exodus.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0026
rows.name:
Once we learned the Earth might be threatened,
we needed a plan to preserve all her various lifeforms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0027
rows.name:
That plan was the Earthlife Colonization Project.
Otherwise known as Project Exodus.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0028
rows.name:
Those of us who escaped on the White Whale
spent over two years wandering in space.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0028_2
rows.name: Two hard years.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0029
rows.name:
But we clung to our mission:
find a habitable planet, and settle there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0030
rows.name: We had no idea how long it would take...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0031
rows.name: Or...that the decision would eventually be made for us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0032
rows.name:
The xenoforms found us again, and...
well, it wasn't a happy reunion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0033
rows.name:
Earth wasn't enough.
They wanted humanity destroyed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0034
rows.name:
For better and for worse, we were close to
planet Mira when we lost control of the White Whale.[ST:page p1=180 ]Inertia and gravity took it from there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0035
rows.name:
The ship had taken way too much damage
to survive entering the atmosphere intact.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0036
rows.name:
We had no choice: we channeled all the power
we had left to soft-land the Habitat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0037
rows.name:
Once the dust cleared, we set to work
transforming it into its current state...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0038
rows.name:
Searching for survivors, establishing BLADE,
installing the provisional government...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0039
rows.name: Basically making it a sustainable city.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0040
rows.name: BLADE is an acronym.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0041
rows.name:
"Builders of a Legacy After the Destruction of Earth."
Quite fitting, I think.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0042
rows.name: It's a relatively new organization.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0043
rows.name:
Up there in space, we had plenty of provisions,[ST:page p1=90 ]and a crew trained to handle the limited amount
of situations we might encounter in our travels...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0044
rows.name:
But, of course, all that changed after we lost
most of our ship and came crashing down here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0045
rows.name:
We needed food. Water.
Search and rescue teams. Surveyors. Police...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0046
rows.name:
The list goes on and on. It was too much for the provisional
government to manage on its own. So BLADE was born.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0047
rows.name:
The idea was to have one central organization
with different disciplines to fill these various roles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0048
rows.name:
Its core was pulled from the Coalition military,
so it's mostly former soldiers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0049
rows.name: But...fighting isn't our most important duty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0050
rows.name:
Right now, we have a single, top priority
that supersedes all others:[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0051
rows.name: The search for—and recovery of—the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0052
rows.name: Take a look at this.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0053
rows.name:
The White Whale was designed to carry an exceedingly
large number of passengers, all of them held in stasis...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0054
rows.name: All housed in a structure called the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0055
rows.name: This is a complete schematic of that facility.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0056
rows.name:
Only essential personnel were conscious and active for the
journey from Earth. The flight crew, maintenance engineers...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0057
rows.name:
And of course, some military,
so we could defend ourselves if necessary.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0058
rows.name:
But the vast majority were in the Lifehold—
ARE in the Lifehold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0059
rows.name:
With any luck, they're all still there, in stasis,
waiting to be rescued.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0060
rows.name: But, there's a problem...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0061
rows.name:
We know now the Lifehold broke apart along with
the rest of the ship when we came down on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0062
rows.name:
What we don't know is exactly where all the pieces landed.
Not very comforting, I know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0063
rows.name: BLADE's top priority now is locating the missing units.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0066
rows.name:
Ah, yes—all citizens of NLA are required
to register their name, age, and occupation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0067
rows.name:
We also ask you report any personal assets, and take
a short survey regarding your current state of health.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0068
rows.name: All purely as a precaution—I'm sure you understand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0069
rows.name:
As the caretakers of humanity's survival,
we all have certain responsibilities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0070
rows.name:
And hey—it's not all bad.
Registering gets you access to all kinds of public services.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0071
rows.name:
In any case, I'm sure this is all a lot to digest.
You'll be wanting some time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0072
rows.name: Ms. Koo—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0073
rows.name:
Even I'M tired of hearing myself speak.
Why don't you take our guest out for some air?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0074
rows.name: Perhaps a tour of the administrative district.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0076
rows.name: Yes, sir![ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01040150_MSG0076_02
rows.name: C'mon. We'll keep this briefing brief.[ST:wait ]
